name: GetPortfolioDetails
description:
Retrieve complete details of a specific portfolio in Asana.

This tool is used to obtain the full record of a particular portfolio in Asana, given its unique ID. It requires the 'portfolios:read' scope and returns comprehensive details including any custom field settings if the 'custom_fields:read' scope is also available.

parameters.name: portfolio_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the specific portfolio to retrieve details.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

parameters.description: List of properties to include in the response. Specify as a list of strings for fields you wish to include, as the API excludes some by default.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for pretty, readable formatting of the output. Useful for debugging, but increases response size and time.
